metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4372 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memory handling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 12.1, tvOS 12.1, watchOS 5.1, Safari 12.0.1, iTunes 12.9.1, iCloud for Windows 7.8.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4372` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

advisory.DiscoveredBy: HyungSeok Han, DongHyeon Oh, and Sang Kil Cha

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
